Reviews.Title: “Very Happy”

Reviews.Content: basically arrived pouring rain airport boat san marco pier hotel 90 euro night steep expecting expensive anyway trail venice rain looking clean tidy quiet warm average breakfast compared rest italy filled gap central close boat train station left reception serious complaints

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Casenova”
Reviews.Author: horwood
Reviews.Content: stayed nights found location hotel convenient venice venice european experience funny watching people trailing city towing suitcases taxis buses hotel door hotel convenient water taxis vaporetto short walk st marks gardens harrys bar short stay clean decorated 4th floor quiet internally noisy windows please remember city vehicles foot people walk 1am troubled talking bathroom ok taps etc polish carried 4th night probably housekeeper breakfast basic tea coffee fruit juice choice yoghurt basket rolls jam butter cheese portion front desk efficient warmth welcome restauraunts opposite door miss cheap nasty opinion

Reviews.Title: “Great location,helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: Camel123
Reviews.Content: supposed staying campo hotelbut arrived water damage stayso booked single tiny dark newly decorated bathroom view looked onto narrow dark street noise bed rock hard breakfast basket tiny little yogurt jams etc staff helpfull location excellent literally left left store straight 1 min st marks minute walk max free laptop internet dont spend time roombut view little canal quaint original hotel location worth considering im

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: Kira812
Reviews.Content: flight venice chicago excited arrive charming hotel pretty pictured website expecting single wa single bed double expected europe clean bathroom remodeled bed extremely comfortable stayed italy location perfect 5 minute walk san marco square dont expect sleep peacefully faced bustling street constantly tourists hear wthe windows closed didnt bother peace breakfast nice breakfest bread basket unlimited cafes etc didnt bother liked try tons cafes stores shopping near attractions hotel staff ok overly friendly free internet computer set lobby password wireless stay location charm
